tuv.seg: # [valid_referers] none in valid_referers Module [ngx_http_referer_module](http://nginx.org/en/docs/http/ngx_http_referer_module.html) allows to block the access to service for requests with wrong `Referer` value.
# [valid_referers] hage Module [ngx_http_referer_module](http://nginx.org/en/docs/http/ngx_http_referer_module.html) allows to block the access to service for requests with wrong `Referer` value.
